info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 11:31AM EDT until June 18 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL BALDWIN AND WEST CENTRAL ESCAMBIA COUNTIES... At 1030 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Bratt to 7 miles north of Loxley to 3 miles southwest of Stapleton, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Robertsdale, Loxley, Stapleton, Summerdale and Silverhill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
